videos.description: The Pistons get out in transition and Sekou Doumbouya is the beneficiary with a slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Doumbouya steps through and slams it down) 2021/05/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: Doumbouya steps through and slams it down

videos.description: LaMelo Ball gets fancy on this assist to Bismack Biyombo for a dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LaMelo flicks slick no-look feed for Biyombo's jam) 2021/05/04 ESHEET

videos.headline: LaMelo flicks slick no-look feed for Biyombo's jam

videos.description: LaMelo Ball fires a quick pass through traffic to Jalen McDaniels for a layup.
